As one of the few people who actually seems to have been able to download this, I feel I should warn you that avg found a virus. Im not an idiot, I know that antivirus sofware seems to think alot of torrented games and software are viruses, but I just thought id give you a heads up. And for the record, I cant get it to work either.

Oh, and the fact that nobody can get it to work, and he warns you to turn off your antivirus if it dosent. I have never downloaded a torrent where your antivirus had to be deactivated for it to work, and his explanation for this dosent sound 100% legit. It just seems strange.
